name: sahar-server
description: Standalone Unified Server for SAHAR TV Remote

scripts.shared:buildpack: npm run shared:build && npm run shared:pack
scripts.shared:install:all: npm run shared:install:server && npm run shared:install:tv && npm run shared:install:remote
scripts.build:clients: cd ../apps/tv && npm run build && cd ../remote && npm run build
scripts.relink:shared: npm run shared:buildpack && npm run shared:install:all
scripts.rebuild:all: npm run build && npm run build:clients
scripts.start:with-shared: npm run relink:shared && npm run rebuild:all && node dist/main.js
scripts.typecheck:all: npm run typecheck && cd ../shared && npm run typecheck && cd ../apps/tv && npm run typecheck && cd ../apps/remote && npm run typecheck
